title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 137.11 - Failure to participate in arbitration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 137.11 - Failure to participate in arbitration

State Regulations

All attorneys are required to participate
in the arbitration program established by this Part upon the filing of a
request for arbitration by a client in conformance with these rules. An
attorney who without good cause fails to participate in the arbitration process
shall be referred to the appropriate grievance committee of the Appellate

Division for appropriate action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
137.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
